channel.title: Projects on My Learning Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on My Learning Journey

item.title: Personal Portfolio
item.description:
This is the project you are looking at right now! It’s a custom-built Hugo theme designed for speed and simplicity.

Features

  • Fast Loading: No heavy frameworks, just vanilla HTML/CSS.
  • SEO Optimized: Includes OpenGraph, Twitter Cards, and Schema.org data.
  • Dark Mode: Built-in dark mode support using CSS variables.
  • Responsive: Looks great on mobile and desktop.

item.title: Weather App
item.description:
A React-based weather application that fetches real-time weather data.

Key Learnings

  • Fetching data from REST APIs.
  • Managing state with React Hooks.
  • Handling asynchronous operations.
